title: fabber_dwi
description: Fabber diffusion-weighted imaging tool for model-based analysis using forward models and different inference methods.

data_file.title: Input Data File
data_file.description: Specify a single input data file

help_flag.title: Help Flag
help_flag.description: Print this usage method. If given with --method or --model, display relevant method/model usage information

listparams_flag.title: List Parameters Flag
listparams_flag.description: List model parameters (requires model configuration options to be given)

descparams_flag.title: Describe Parameters Flag
descparams_flag.description: Describe model parameters (name, description, units) - requires model configuration options to be given. Note that not all models provide parameter descriptions

listoutputs_flag.title: List Outputs Flag
listoutputs_flag.description: List additional model outputs (requires model configuration options to be given)

evaluate.title: Evaluate Model
evaluate.description: Evaluate the model. Set to name of output required or blank for default output. Requires model configuration options, --evaluate-params and --evaluate-nt

evaluate_params.title: Evaluate Parameters
evaluate_params.description: List of parameter values for evaluation

evaluate_nt.title: Evaluate Number of Time Points
evaluate_nt.description: Number of time points for evaluation - must be consistent with model options where appropriate

simple_output_flag.title: Simple Output
simple_output_flag.description: Instead of usual standard output, simply output a series of lines each giving progress as a percentage

overwrite_flag.title: Overwrite Existing Output
overwrite_flag.description: If set, will overwrite existing output. If not set, new output directories will be created by appending '+' to the directory name

link_to_latest_flag.title: Link to Latest Output
link_to_latest_flag.description: Try to create a link to the most recent output directory with the prefix _latest

loadmodels.title: Load Models
loadmodels.description: Load models dynamically from the specified filename, which should be a DLL/shared library

multiple_data_files.title: Additional Data Files
multiple_data_files.description: Specify multiple data files for n=1, 2, 3...

data_order.title: Data File Handling Order
data_order.description: If multiple data files are specified, how they will be handled: concatenate = one after the other, interleave = first record from each file, then second, etc.

mask_file.title: Mask File
mask_file.description: Mask file. Inference will only be performed where mask value > 0

masked_timepoints.title: Masked Time Points
masked_timepoints.description: List of masked time points, indexed from 1. These will be ignored in the parameter updates

supp_data.title: Supplemental Timeseries Data
supp_data.description: 'Supplemental' timeseries data, required for some models

dump_param_names_flag.title: Dump Parameter Names
dump_param_names_flag.description: Write the file paramnames.txt containing the names of the model parameters

save_model_fit_flag.title: Save Model Fit
save_model_fit_flag.description: Output the model prediction as a 4d volume

save_residuals_flag.title: Save Residuals
save_residuals_flag.description: Output the residuals (difference between the data and the model prediction)

save_model_extras_flag.title: Save Model Extras
save_model_extras_flag.description: Output any additional model-specific timeseries data

save_noise_mean_flag.title: Save Noise Means
save_noise_mean_flag.description: Output the noise means. The noise distribution inferred is the precision of a Gaussian noise source

save_free_energy_flag.title: Save Free Energy
save_free_energy_flag.description: Output the free energy, if calculated

optfile.title: Additional Options File
optfile.description: File containing additional options, one per line, in the same form as specified on the command line

debug_flag.title: Debug Flag
debug_flag.description: Output large amounts of debug information. ONLY USE WITH VERY SMALL NUMBERS OF VOXELS
